core.name: Coma - Stargazing
core.description:
At 600 meter, hold ATK to use Charged ATK
Activates Astral Harness mode. Summons [Phantom Abyssal Tornado] to deal 12x20% + 200% ATK Fire DMG

When Astral Harness is in active and there is a [Phantom Abyssal Tornado], hold ATK button to release [Starfire Relay], deal 4x30% ATK Fire DMG and swings a enhanced [Phantom Abyssal Tornado] to deal 12x30% ATK Fire DMG

When Astral Harness is in active and there is an Enhanced [Phantom Abyssal Tornado], hold ATK button to release [Blooming Starfire], pulling enemies in a big aoe, deal 4x20% ATK Fire DMG and stabs forward to deal 1300% ATK Fire DMG. Ends Astral Harness and empties out the meter.

subskills.name: Coma Eta
subskills.description: During Astral Harness, Total DMG +40.0%, anti-interrupt increased and reduce dmg taken by 40.0% Total DMG.

subskills.name: Coma Gamma
subskills.description: Restore 10.0 sp when using Charged ATK Blooming Starfire.

core.name: Eridanus - Flow of Time
core.description:
In normal form, recovers 80 star meter per second, max 600.
In Astral Harness mode, consumes 50 star meter per second until meter is 0 or SPA leaves the field.
In Astral Harness mode, Charged ATK summons [Phantom Abyssal Tornado] and gathering enemies in a small area and forms [Brilliant Star Formation]. When SPA exits, Tornado and Star Formation disappears.

subskills.name: Durandal's Blessing
subskills.description: Enemies within [Brilliant Star Formation] receive 20.0% more Fire DMG from SPA. (independent bonus)

subskills.name: Eridanus α
subskills.description: In normal form, when 4th Basic ATK hits, restore 50 meter.

subskills.name: Eridanus β
subskills.description: Fire DMG +80%. SPA attacks against ignited enemies gain Fire DMG +20%.

core.name: Pisces - Sun and Moon
core.description:
SPA instantly gets 600 meter and enter Astral Harness, gathering mimic durandal blade to form a huge [Phantom Abyssal Tornado] to deal a total of 1500% + 12x20% ATK Fire DMG. Pauses timer.
After ult ends, summons [Enhanced Phantom Abyssal Tornado] in front of SPA.
[100 sp, 20s CD]

subskills.name: Pisces Eta
subskills.description: When entering Astral Harness state, triggers 2s Time Fracture.

subskills.name: Pisces Gamma
subskills.description: Enemies hit by [Phantom Abyssal Tornado] are ignited. Every 0.5s, inflict 30% ATK Fire DMG, lasts for 8s.

core.name: Andromeda - Nebula Song
core.description:
Evasion skill: Trigger 3s Time Fracture. In Astral Harness mode, gain 5 [Blazar] stacks additionally. If there is an ignited enemy near [Brilliant Star Formation], recover 200 HP. CD: 15s
Press Basic ATK after evasion to connect to Basic ATK 3rd sequence.

subskills.name: Andromeda α
subskills.description: When evasion skill is triggered, valk Total DMG +15.0% for 3s and restore extra 5 sp.

subskills.name: Andromeda β
subskills.description: On switch in, restore 200 star meter. CD:10s

core.name: Canis - Sirius Shine
core.description:
ATK Sequence all fire damage, recover star meter
1st Sequence: Deals 80% ATK of Fire DMG and restores 10 star meter
2nd Sequence: Deals 40%+100% ATK of Fire DMG and restores 5 + 10 star meter
3rd Sequence: Deals 40%+100% ATK of Fire DMG and restores 10 + 15 star meter
4th Sequence: Deals 3x60% + 250% ATK of Fire DMG and restores 3x5+20 star meter

In Astral Harness mode:
1st Sequence: Deals 100% and applies 1 Starfire
2nd Sequence: Deals 60%+100% and applies 1 Starfire
3rd Sequence: Deals 40%+150% and applies 2 Starfire
4th Sequence: Deals  4x20% + 250%
5th Sequence: 500% + 800%

In Astral Harness mode, each 1st, 2nd, 3rd ATK inflicts Starfire DMG. Each Starfire deals 30% ATK of Fire DMG.

In Astral Harness mode, SPA gains [Blazar] stacks for each basic ATK hit. 1st~4th basic ATKs adds 1 [Blazar] stack. 5th basic ATK adds 5 [Blazar] stacks. Max at 20. When using Ult, SPA instantly gains full stacks of [Blazar].
After using Ult or leaving Astral Harness mode, the stacks are cleared.

subskills.name: Canis α
subskills.description: Starfire deal additional 150% ATK Fire DMG.

subskills.name: Canis ε
subskills.description: In Astral Harness, 4th Basic ATK ignites enemy, every 0.5s they take 30% ATK Fire DMG. Lasts for 8s.

subskills.name: QTE: Canis δ
subskills.description: QTE: Triggered when an enemy is ignited or knocked airborne, trigger 3s Time Fracture, deal 5x250% ATK Fire DMG, restore 5 SP.
